question: What will be the theme for the 12th International Oil and Gas Conference and Exhibition, PETROTECH-2016 that will be held in New Delhi from 5 to 7 December 2016?
option1: Hydrocarbons to fuel the future - Choices and Challenges
option2: Hydrocarbons a life for the world - Challenges and Choices
answer: Hydrocarbons to fuel the future - Choices and Challenges
